examples.description: outputs a welcome message and asks the user for input
examples.full_description: ./bin/greet executing a CLI Application outputs a welcome message and asks the user for input

examples.description: uses #gets.strip to capture the user input and set it equal to a variable called name
examples.full_description: ./bin/greet executing a CLI Application uses #gets.strip to capture the user input and set it equal to a variable called name

examples.description: calls on the #greeting method with an argument of the user's name
examples.full_description: ./bin/greet executing a CLI Application calls on the #greeting method with an argument of the user's name

examples.description: calls on the #greeting method with an argument of the user's name and returns the new greeting, interpolating the user's name
examples.full_description: ./bin/greet executing a CLI Application calls on the #greeting method with an argument of the user's name and returns the new greeting, interpolating the user's name
